reviewText: We really liked this dvd.  It is divided between the puppets, live action footage and singing characters.  It is a lot to pack into only 20 minutes and therefore it kept the attention of my 3 year old daughter. Her favorite part was when Mr. Jibblets was in the garden and was soaked by the sprinklers!  A great homemade product that has kept us coming back to it again and again.
Mr. Jibblets was totally hilarious!  I have a 7 yr. old and a 4 yr. old and they both loved it!  We can't wait to see Mr. Lucarelli's next video!
This is a very clever video with excellent songs for learning and singing along to.  My 2 1/2 year old daughter loved it.  Look forward to more adventures with Mr. Jibblets.

I watched this DVD with my 6 year old daughter.  Both of us thought Mr. Jibblets was adorable and fun to watch. It's a wonderful combination of fun adventures and catchy tunes set to great video.  You can watch it over and over again!

I purchased this item for my grandchildren, ages 5 and 8 and they thoroughly enjoyed it and laughed at all the segments.  The 5 yr.old girl said her favorite was "Blockhead" and the laundry segment.  The 8 yr.old boy liked "Dig It" and so did his Grandma.  The music and pictures went with the story and were really clever.
This is a creative and very funny dvd.  You may enjoy it as much or more than your child.  This grandpa did.
